Azerbaijan is developing successfully.
There are very successful economic reforms in our country, and new technologies, information-communication (cont) http://t.co/r3gPxGZG
2013 was declared in Azerbaijan as my "Year of Information and Communication Technologies".
I am confident that we will achieve even greater achievements in the field of information and communication technologies this year and in the following years.
The launch of the first satellite into orbit is, of course, a very significant historical event.
We started this work five years ago.
In 2008, I decided to launch the # Azerbaijan satellite into orbit.
In 2009, the State Program was adopted. In 2010, Azercosmos Joint Stock Company (cont) http://t.co/VlqOhfUm
We are also actively working to bring new satellites into orbit in the future, and we will achieve this.
In 2015, 2016, two additional satellites will be launched into orbit, and now the space industry in Azerbaijan (cont) http://t.co/PBGxD2O4
This satellite's performance will be economically viable. At the same time, information-communication (cont) http://t.co/SIw3UCvD
The ICT area will play a decisive role for the successful, sustainable development of each country.
We take all the steps that will strengthen our country, Azerbaijan will become even more modern.
The Decree I recently signed on establishing the University of Information Technology confirms what I have said.
February 8, 2013 will remain in the history of Azerbaijan.
Dear compatriots, I heartily congratulate you on this historic event. Love Azerbaijan!
